column4: hey guys.. i was wondering if someone could either offer a tutorial or just help me setup gparted for dual booting windows and ubuntu 10.10?
thanks yo
guess i'll try installing ubuntu now :D
if i post a screenshot can you guys tel me if i did it right please?
ok cool
can someone please tell me if this is ready to dual boot and install?
http://img96.imageshack.us/img96/6915/screenshotaxr.png
can you guys please take a look at my screenshot? i really would apprecaite the help
That looks fine
i  want to know if i set it up right
what about the windows 7 ntfs partition? it doesn't need to be setup as /boot?
no, don't worry about that
can everyone please check to see if this is ok
http://img96.imageshack.us/img96/6915/screenshotaxr.png
hello
nite
/boot is something that'll reside on your /dev/sda3. People sometimes put them on a seperate partition for a couple of reasons, but you won't need to
so the windows partition is ok the way it is? grub will definitely recognize it?
i'm ready to install?
it's not guaranteed it'll recognise it, but it's easily fixed, so just go ahead and install
ok thanks
i'm gonna try to install now
wish me luck :D
my fingers are all crossed
